tests.name: coverage lab1a
tests.run: python3 -m coverage run lab1a_tests.py >/dev/null ; python3 -m coverage report -m --fail-under=100

tests.name: type check 1a
tests.run: echo "mypy type check"; mypy --disallow-untyped-defs lab1a.py lab1a_tests.py

tests.name: coverage location
tests.run: python3 -m coverage run location_tests.py >/dev/null; python3 -m coverage report -m --fail-under=100

tests.name: type check location
tests.run: echo "mypy type check"; mypy --disallow-untyped-defs location.py location_tests.py
